verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
This life is just a fleeting shadow
I realise that life is found in You alone

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Until my heart has found its home
With all the saints before Your throne
I'll live my life for You alone
'Cause You call me Your own

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You shine brighter than the brightest sun
Your light endures when all is said and done

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You're the lion, You're the lamb
The first and last, The Great I Am
The Son of God, the Son of Man
With wounds in Your hands

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Forever, oh Lord, You will be the Eternal Son
